refnamediv.refpurpose: Creates a callable to call an instance method on a specific object

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
callableinst_meth objecttarget stringmethod_name
inst_meth takes an object and a method name, and returns a callable which will invoke that method on that class instance. Like fun, this is in order to aide the typechecker in statically analyzing callbacks passed into and out of functions.
Unlike meth_caller, this returns a callable which calls a specific method on the specific object passed in.

&reftitle.parameters;
target
Object to call a method on.
method_name
Instance method to call. Must be a constant, single-quoted string.
